name: Nairobi National Park
description: A unique wildlife park located just outside the city center. Home to lions, rhinos, giraffes, and more.

name: Giraffe Centre
description: An educational center and sanctuary for the endangered Rothschild giraffe.

name: Karen Blixen Museum
description: Historic farmhouse once home to the famous author of 'Out of Africa'.

name: Bomas of Kenya
description: Cultural center offering traditional Kenyan music, dance, and architecture.

name: Nairobi Railway Museum
description: Showcases Kenya's rich railway history with vintage locomotives and artifacts.

name: David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust
description: Elephant orphanage focused on rescue and rehabilitation of baby elephants.

name: Uhuru Park
description: Popular recreational park in the heart of the city for gatherings, picnics, and boating.
